column9: How would you describe the pain you usually have in your knee?
column12: Have you been troubled by pain from your knee in bed at night?
column15: Have you had any trouble with washing and drying yourself (all over) because of your knee?
column18: Have you had any trouble getting in and out of a car or using public transportation because of your knee?
column21: How long have you been able to walk before the pain in your Knee becomes severe (with or without a walking aid)?
column24: After a meal (sat at a table), how painful has it been for you to stand up from a chair because of your knee?
column27: Have you been limping when walking because of your knee?
column30: If you were to kneel down could you stand up afterwards?
column33: How much has pain from your knee interfered with your usual work, including housework?
column36: Have you felt that your knee might suddenly give way or let you down?
column39: Have you been able to do the household shopping on your own?
column42: Have you been able to walk down a flight of stairs?
